content: आकुल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Full of, burdened or filled with (in general); प्रचलदूर्मिमालाकुलं (समुद्रं) <ls>Bh. 2. 4</ls>; मृगपक्षिगणाकुलं <ls>Rām.</ls>; बाष्पाकुलांवाचं <ls>Nala. 4. 18</ls>; आलापकुतूहलाकुलतरे श्रोत्रे <ls>Amaru. 81.</ls> {@--2@} Overcome, affected or afflicted, smit; हर्ष°, शोक°, विस्मय°, स्नेह° &c. {@--3@} Busily or intently engaged or absorbed in; <ls>Ś. 4. 18.</ls> {@--4@} Confounded, agitated, flurried, distracted; अभिचैद्यं प्रतिष्ठासुरासीत्कार्यद्वयाकुलः <ls>Śi. 2. 1</ls>; perplexed, at a loss what to do, undetermined; <ls>Ki. 2. 54.</ls> °आकुल very much agitated; <ls>K. 10</ls>, <ls n="K.">28</ls>; <ls>Ki. 14. 32.</ls> {@--5@} Dishevelled, disordered (as hair); असंयताकुलालकान् <ls>K. 60</ls>, <ls n="K.">243</ls>; <ls>Ratn. 1. 17</ls>; <ls>Ki. 8. 18.</ls> {@--6@} Wild, dreary; <ls>Ś. 2.</ls> {@--7@} Taken out of one's natural condition. {@--8@} Incoherent, contradictory. --लं An inhabited place; रहितेष्वाकुलेषु च <ls>Rām.</ls> {%--<ab>adv.</ab>%} In bewilderment; <ls>Śi. 1. 2.</ls>
